summary: REQ-8 is implemented in the UI: clicking "Yes" transitions to an answered state that renders a single "Good Choice" meme image via an absolute /assets/generated/... path, replacing the prior two-image reveal. However, REQ-9 is only partially met: the code references the new static asset, but the diff shows no added image file under the public generated assets directory.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the "Good Choice" meme image as a static frontend asset under the generated assets path.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references "/assets/generated/valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_1200x800.png", but the diff indicates no files were added (Added: 0). There is no evidence the actual image file was added under the frontend public generated assets directory.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a romantic theme system (global CSS OKLCH palette, custom animations, Tailwind theme tokens/fonts) beyond the requested change to the answered view/image swap.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to restore the single "Good Choice" meme on Yes and add it as a static asset; it does not request theme/CSS/Tailwind changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a footer promoting caffeine.ai with a dynamic hostname-based UTM link.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding a footer, external promotional link, or attribution block.
